text: fa'iidha rkb alkufaar alsufun fi albhr, wkhafu alghrq, whhadu allh, wa'akhlasuu lah fi alduea' hal shdthm, falamaa njjahm 'iilaa albr, wzalt eanhum alshdt, eaduu 'iilaa shrkhm, 'iinahum bhdha ytnaqdwn, ywhhidwn allah saeatan alshdt, wyshrkwn bih saeatan alrkha'. wshirkhm baed nemtna ealayhim balnjat min albhr; lykwn eaqbth alkufr bima 'aneamna ealayhim fi 'anfusihim wamwalhm, wlykmlu tmtehm fi hadhih aldnya, fasawf yaelamun fasad emlhm, wama aeddah allah lahum min eadhab 'alim yawm alqyam. wafi dhlk tahdid wweyd lhm
